responses.rationale: Factual reporting of confirmed cases and locations without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of virus spread and potential outcome ('prove deadly') without amplification.
Contains explicit calming language ('risk still remains low') which triggers Q5.
Factual reporting of a quoted statement ('concerning') which is not amplified for Alarmist framing.
Factual description of animal relationships and scientific use without explicit framing.
